A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## 🔄 Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## ✅ Expected Behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- **OS**: [e.g. Windows 11, macOS 14, Ubuntu 22.04]
- **MarkZen Version**: [e.g. 0.1.0]
